"Good Job":
"Good Job

Sending a Good Job is a way to thank other ARKS for their efforts. By sending a Good Job, you earn FUN points for both you and the person you sent the Good Job to; be sure to add a comment to get bonus FUN!

Try sending Good Job right now!
